content:
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/releases

I was attempting to open up the additional assets (since I needed something farther down the list) for 3.0.1 and when I try to do so, it just hangs.

Opening the additional assets for 3.0.0 works fine.

If this is not the right place to post this, please advise and sorry.

Releases · bytecodealliance/wasmtime
A fast and secure runtime for WebAssembly. Contribute to bytecodealliance/wasmtime development by creating an account on GitHub.
No idea if this is related, but go get github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime-go@v3.0.2 also is hanging...

some more experiments showed that the problem with wasmtime-go was apparently transient....

but this did work:

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/releases/download/v3.0.1/wasmtime-v3.0.1-x86_64-linux.tar.xz

so it looks like just the UI of GH is hosed?
The releases open up for me so maybe just a transient github issue?
